entry.title: Don't tell my parents. Please

entry.title: Coming for Krypton
entry.summary:
Author: teethlikemoonlight

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,976Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 182

Summary: Tim and Conner were planning their future together. With all they've been through, would it even be possible for them to safely conceive? To start a family? Sure, they didn't know if they even wanted kids; but it sure as shit would be nice if they'd at least have the option to.If fate hadn't completely fucked them over, just once.So, with Tim on the fortress' diagnostics table, the procedure takes an unexpected (but not unwanted) turn.

entry.title: We Don’t Have To Take Our Clothes Off (To Have A Good Time)
entry.summary:
Author: Toscaredtospeak

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,195Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 203

Summary: Kon had changed his perception on what could be classified as sex. It changed more and more as he reflected on himself, the way he wanted to have sex, the way he has had sex, and all the overlap that came with it. So, by his own definition, he and Tim have had sex. Several times in fact. Hell, sometimes when they kissed it felt like sex. Dirty and perfect. Sensual and loving. Open and giving. But that doesn’t change the fact that within what he considers sex, Kon still wanted to do more. He wanted to fuck. The problem was that the universe was adamant that never happened. — Kon and Tim’s almost, almost, and finally, and all the trust, love, and too delicate feelings that come with it.
